SENTENCE.PINYIN: Nǐ hǎo
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: こんにちは
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Hello

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Xièxiè nǐ
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: ありがとうございます
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Thank you

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Tā zhèngzài zhǎo gōngzuò.
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 彼は今まさに仕事を探しています。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: He is looking for a job.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Wǒ juéde yíhéyuán de fēngjǐng tèbié měi.
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 我觉得颐和园的风景特别美。
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 頤和園の風景は特に美しいと思います。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: I think view of Yiheyuan has especially beautiful

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Nǐ qǐng tā chī běijīng kǎoyāle ma?
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 你请他吃北京烤鸭了吗？
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 彼に北京ダックを食べさせましたか？
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Have you fed him Peking duck?

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Wán de shíjiān shǎole.
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 遊ぶ時間が少なくなってしまいました。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: No time to have fun.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Nǐ yóuyǒng yóu de zěnme yàng?
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: あなたは泳ぐのはどうですか？（得意ですか？）
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: How is your swimming skill？

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Yīnwéi lùshàng dǔchēle, \n suǒyǐ qìchē kāile wǔshí fēnzhōng cái dào.
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 因为路上堵车了，\n所以汽车开了50分钟才到。
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 道路が渋滞していたので、50分運転してやっと着きました。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: I finally arrived after a 50-minute \n car drive due to a traffic jam.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Dì yī cì shì zài quánjùdé chī de, \n dì èr cì shì zài xuéxiào fùjìn de fànguǎn chī de
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 第一次是在全聚德吃的，\n第二次是在学校附近的饭馆吃的。
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 最初は全聚徳で食べ、次は学校の近くのレストランで食べました。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: First we had a meal here, \n and then at another restaurant near the school.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Wǒ hái cónglái méi xuéguò Hànyǔgē ne.
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 我还从来没学过汉语歌呢。
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 私はこれまでに中国語の歌を習ったことがありません。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: I have never learn Chinese songs.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Wéi, shì liúxuéshēng sùshè ma?
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: もしもし、留学生宿舎ですか？
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Hello ,is the student dormitory?

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Nàme, dǎrǎo nǐle.
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: じゃあ、お邪魔します。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Well, thank you for having me.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Zhēn bàoqiàn, ràng nǐ jiǔ děngle.
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: すみません、お待たせしました。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: So, I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Qī diǎn yǐqián, huí de lái huí bu lái?
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 7時前に戻ってこられますか？
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Will you come back before 7 ?

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Nǐ háishì gēn jiālǐ rén \n zài hǎo hao shāngliang shāngliang ba.
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 你还是跟家里人\n再好好儿商量商量吧。
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: さらに家族とよく相談しなくちゃ。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: You still talk with the family no matter \n how good it is to discuss it.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Nǐ néng bùnéng bǎ nǐ de zìxíngchē \n jiè gěi wǒ yòng yòng.
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 你能不能把你的自行车\n借给我用用。
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: あなたの自転車をちょっと借りてもいいですか？
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Can you lend me your bike for use?

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Chōuyān duì shēntǐ méiyǒu hǎochù
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 喫煙は体によくありません。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Smoking is not good for the body.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Nǐ zěnmele?
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: どうしましたか？
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: What happened to you?

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Wǒ jīntiān zhēnshì dǎoméi tòule.
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 今日はまったくついていません。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: I’ve had no luck today.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Wǒ mǎshàng jiù qù
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: すぐに行きます。
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: I'll go right away.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Chī pútáo bù tǔ pútáo pí, \n bù chī pútáo dào tǔ pútáo pí
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮，\n不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: ぶどうを食べたのにぶどうの皮を出さない、ぶどうを食べないのにぶどうの皮を出す
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: You ate a grape and didn’t spit the skin from your mouth, \n you spit the skin although you didn’t eat a grape.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Shuō cáocāo cáocāo jiù dào
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 噂をすれば影
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Speak of the Devil.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Hēi lǐyú lǜ lǐyú yǔ lǘ
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 黒い鯉と緑の鯉とロバ
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Black carp, green carp, and a donkey.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Zhè shì cán, nà shì chán, \n cán cháng zài yè lǐ cáng, chán cháng zài lín lǐ chàng
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 这是蚕，那是蝉，\n蚕常在叶里藏，蝉常在林里唱
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: これは蚕、あれは蝉、蚕はいつも葉陰に隠れ、蝉はいつも森で鳴く
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: This is a silkworm, that is a cicada. Silkworms always hide under the leaves, \n and cicadas always chirp in the forest.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Chīmèiwǎngliǎng
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 魑魅魍魎
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: The Devil and monsters

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Bāxiānguòhǎi, gè xiǎn qí néng
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 八人の仙人が海を渡り、それぞれの能力を発揮する
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: 8 hermits crossed the sea, \n and each of them exerted their own abilities.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Bīngdòng sān chǐ, fēi yí rì zhī hán
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: ローマは1日してならず
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Rome was not built in a day.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Chéngxìng ér lái, bàixìng ér guī
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 楽しみにやって来たが、がっかりして帰る
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Although we looked forward to coming here, \n we went back disappointed.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Chūncán dào sǐ sī fāng jǐn, \n là jù chéng huī lèi shǐ gàn
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 春蚕到死丝方尽，\n蜡炬成灰泪始干
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 蚕は死ぬまで糸を吐き，ロウソクは灰になるまで涙を流す
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: A silkworm disgorges threads till death, \n and a candle sheds tears till becoming ash.

SENTENCE.PINYIN: Xué rú nìshuǐxíngzhōu, \n bù jìn zé tuì
SENTENCE.CHINESE: 学如逆水行舟，\n不进则退
SENTENCE.JAPANESE: 学ぶことは川の流れに逆らって舟を漕ぐようなもので、進まなければ後退する
SENTENCE.ENGLISH: Learning is like rowing a boat against the flow of a river; \n you fall back if you don’t go forward.
